name: Leena AI
description: Leena AI's Gen AI-powered Autonomous Agent, driven by the proprietary WorkLM, revolutionizes global enterprises by boosting productivity and efficiency. It minimizes IT, HR, and Finance tickets, ensuring a seamless experience across tech stacks. With a 70% self-service guarantee, WorkLM delivers human-like responses, integrating with over 1,000 applications. Trusted by top enterprises, Leena AI supports 100+ languages, transforming work for millions globally.
Headline:
Revolutionizing employee
 experience
 for enterprises
ShortDescription: Unlock the potential of a future-ready employee experience

Highlights.name: Information at your fingertips
Highlights.description: Leena AI consolidates information across systems, giving teams easy access to what they need.

Highlights.name: Uncover enterprise insights
Highlights.description: Leena AI uncovers insights from data to help businesses make informed strategic choices.

Highlights.name: Workflow automation
Highlights.description: Leena AI streamlines processes, reducing tickets and manual tasks.

enhanced_description: Leena AI offers a Gen AI-powered Autonomous Agent, leveraging its proprietary WorkLM, designed to revolutionize the employee experience for global enterprises. This solution boosts productivity and efficiency by minimizing IT, HR, and Finance tickets, ensuring a seamless experience across diverse tech stacks. WorkLM guarantees a 70% self-service rate, delivering human-like responses and integrating with over 1,000 applications. Trusted by top enterprises, it supports over 100 languages, transforming work for millions globally. Key capabilities include consolidating information for easy access across systems, uncovering enterprise insights from data to inform strategic choices, and automating workflows to reduce manual tasks and tickets. It aims to streamline HR initiatives, improve employee happiness and engagement, and support areas like employee satisfaction, development, empowerment, and grievance handling, while also boosting IT efficiency and driving sales success.
key_use_cases: Minimizing IT, HR, and Finance support tickets
Uncovering enterprise insights from HR and operational data
competitive_advantages: Proven trust by top global enterprises
Ability to minimize IT, HR, and Finance tickets across departments
integration_capabilities: Consolidation of information across disparate systems
roi_benefits: Reduced IT, HR, and Finance support costs (due to ticket minimization and self-service)
Reduced manual tasks and streamlined processes
scalability_features: Designed for global enterprises and millions of users
